title: True Confessions of an Albino Terrorist
brief_description: A fascinating documentary that looks at the white South African writer/painter, Breyten Breytenbach, who is now living in Paris. Breytenbach, who revolted against the South African conditions of apartheid, discusses his experiences in South African prisons and also talks about his poetry and paintings.
